phrases.text: Con cua quẫy nó ở trong hang quẫy a rượng a

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "Con" - child, or humble self-reference. This narrative phrase advances the story, grounding the emotional content in concrete imagery. Northern Vietnamese folk song genre, highly melodic and expressive.
facts: Lý songs originated in Red River Delta region
Often about love, nature, and daily life
Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation
Dan Tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are relatively modern adaptations of vocal traditions
culturalContext.musicalContext: This narrative phrase contains 11 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. Narrative phrases typically use moderate melodic range and steady rhythm to advance the story. Focuses on melodic beauty and expressive ornamentation.

phrases.text: Nó kêu ớ rịnh boong rinh ớ rịnh boong ơi quẫy a rượng a

culturalContext.description: The exclamatory form adds emotional emphasis, common in Vietnamese folk music to engage listeners. Northern Vietnamese folk song genre, highly melodic and expressive.
facts: Lý songs originated in Red River Delta region
Often about love, nature, and daily life
Vietnamese folk songs preserve oral traditions passed down through generations without written notation
Dan Tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are relatively modern adaptations of vocal traditions
culturalContext.musicalContext: This exclamatory phrase contains 14 syllables, longer than typical, allowing for extended melodic development. As an exclamatory phrase, it likely features sustained notes or ascending contours for emotional expression. Focuses on melodic beauty and expressive ornamentation.
